sen.j: 広平親王（ひろひらしんのう、天暦4年（950年） - 天禄2年9月10日 (旧暦)（971年10月1日））は平安時代の皇族で村上天皇第一皇子。
sen.e: Imperial Prince Hirohira (950 - October 1, 971) was a member of the Imperial family and the first Prince of Emperor Murakami in the Heian period.

sen.j: 母は大納言藤原元方の娘の更衣 (女官)藤原祐姫。
sen.e: His mother was FUJIWARA no Sukehime, who was nyogo (a high-ranking lady in the court (a consort of an emperor)) and a daughter of FUJIWARA no Motokata, who held the title of dainagon (major counselor).

sen.j: 同母妹に緝子内親王がいる。
sen.e: Imperial Prince Shushi was his maternal sister.

sen.j: 誕生直後、同年生まれで右大臣藤原師輔の娘で中宮藤原安子が生んだ異母弟で第二皇子の冷泉天皇と皇太子の地位を争った。
sen.e: Soon after he was born, he competed for the position of the imperial prince with his younger brother (the second prince, who would later become Emperor Reizei) born the same year and having a different mother, Empress FUJIWARA no Anshi, who was the daughter of the Minister of the Right, FUJIWARA no Morosuke.
